text:
[Verse]
Colors in the sky
Candy rain falls down
Taste the rainbow love
Sweetness all around

[Verse 2]
Sugar on my lips
Melting in the sun
Dancing in the glow
Life has just begun

[Chorus]
Candy rain candy rain
Feel it falling on your skin
Candy rain candy rain
Let the magic now begin

[Verse 3]
Lollipops on trees
Syrup streams below
Marshmallow dreams
In a world of sugar flow

[Bridge]
Hold my hand let's fly
Through the gummy skies
In this candy rain
Love will never die

[Chorus]
Candy rain candy rain
Feel it falling on your skin
Candy rain candy rain
Let the magic now begin
title: Candy Rain
